prompts.flatlay:
E-commerce product photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos of {{productColor}} tote bag - use for EXACT color, text, and details
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Match EXACT bag position and angle from reference
- Handles up, bag body flat
- Match overall framing and crop

PRODUCT - MUST MATCH INPUT IMAGES:
- {{productColor}} cotton canvas tote bag
- Ombre gradient: pink/coral at top fading to orange at bottom
- "FEARLESS SUMMER" text - COPY EXACT font, size, placement from input
- Two BLACK metal RON DORFF eyelets at bottom
- Handles at top

CRITICAL - BAG APPEARANCE:
- Canvas COMPLETELY FLAT - like stretched on a frame
- PERFECTLY STRAIGHT edges - as if pressed with an iron
- ZERO wrinkles, ZERO creases, ZERO fold marks
- NO sagging, NO bunching, NO soft/floppy areas
- Structured and RIGID appearance
- Factory-fresh, brand new product photography

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray studio backdrop. Bright, even e-commerce lighting.
prompts.eyelet:
E-commerce detail photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos - use for exact color
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Canvas fabric at angle showing eyelets
- Tight macro crop
- Bottom corner of bag visible

PRODUCT DETAILS - MUST INCLUDE:
- Two BLACK metal RON DORFF eyelets
- Eyelets have white text engraved around rim
- {{productColor}} ombre canvas fabric

CRITICAL: Canvas PERFECTLY FLAT. Eyelets sharp and legible.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray background at edges. Bright macro lighting.
prompts.print:
E-commerce print detail photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos - use for EXACT text, font, and color
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Focus on printed text area
- "FEARLESS SUMMER" fills frame
- Match framing from reference

PRODUCT DETAILS:
- {{productColor}} ombre canvas background
- "FEARLESS SUMMER" black text - EXACT font and placement from input
- Ron Dorff branding

CRITICAL: Canvas FLAT beneath print. Text sharp and legible.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray backdrop. Even lighting for accurate color.
